name: Endless Highway DX
description:
We are all going somewhere. Be the king of the road and maybe you'll eventually get to wherever it is you're going.

Tilt your device to weave through traffic in this top down racer. Take risks and get close to other cars to earn points and get pick ups. Earn coins to unlock more vehicles and weapons, and use your skills to navigate through dense, randomly generated traffic.

Don't forget, this is just a game. Please drive responsibly. Real life has no retry button!

Have fun!

Features:
- Use precision tilt controls to steer your car through traffic.

- 3D Touch enabled controls for precision throttle and braking.

- Heavy, randomly generated traffic with individual AI.

- Over 40 different cars to unlock

- Day and night driving

- Gamecenter enabled for leaderboards and achievements.

- iCloud enabled for sharing purchases across your connected devices.
